item.title: Style Guide
item.description: STYLE GUIDE Based on the Poor Man’s styleguide. summer rain document.querySelector('.playpause').addEventListener('click', playpause); function playpause() { if (document.querySelector('.playpause').innerHTML == '') { document.querySelector('#musicsrc').play(); document.querySelector('.playpause').innerHTML = ''; } else { document.querySelector('#musicsrc').pause(); document.querySelector('.playpause').innerHTML = ''; } } #STYLE GUIDE Heading 1 Heading 2 Heading 3 Heading 4 Heading 5 Heading 6 Heading 1 Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, adipiscing elit.
